attributes.action: take down the new traffic lights at the end of Barton stretch/Crossfield estate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These new traffic lights are causing more traffic and congestion rather than helping anything. The congestion around this area is bad enough during the rush hour, these lights are making it worse. Traffic is spilling over into the residential area of Irlam as well. It's bad enough that this is the only driving route in and out of Irlam. There is no need for these lights, they have no real purpose and no positive effect whatsoever.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
